panels.description: The current count of transactions committed to the blockstore. Note that on forking networks, this is not necessarily monotonic.
panels.title: Committed Transactions

panels.description: The number of blocks that go through the validation process
panels.title: Blocks Considered
REST API Validator Response Time (75th Percentile)
Messages Sent Per Second by Type

targets.query: SELECT last("99_percentile") FROM "sawtooth_validator.Component-threadpool.task_run_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

panels.title: Network Threadpool Task Time in Queue
Component Threadpool Task Time in Queue

targets.query: SELECT last("99_percentile") FROM "sawtooth_validator.threadpool.InstrumentedThreadPoolExecutor.task_run_time" WHERE ("name" = 'Signature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

SELECT last("99_percentile") FROM "sawtooth_validator.threadpool.InstrumentedThreadPoolExecutor.task_time_in_queue" WHERE ("name" = 'Signature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

panels.title: Signature Threadpool Task Time in Queue

targets.query: SELECT last("99_percentile") FROM "sawtooth_validator.threadpool.InstrumentedThreadPoolExecutor.task_run_time" WHERE ("name" = 'Executing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

SELECT last("99_percentile") FROM "sawtooth_validator.threadpool.InstrumentedThreadPoolExecutor.task_time_in_queue" WHERE ("name" = 'Executing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("count") FROM "sawtooth_validator.threadpool.InstrumentedThreadPoolExecutor.workers_in_use" WHERE ("name" = 'Executing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "sawtooth_validator.interconnect.dispatcher_queue_size" WHERE ("connection" = 'OutBoundCOnnectionTHread') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "sawtooth_validator.interconnect.dispatcher_queue_size" WHERE ("connection" =~ 'OutboundConnectionThread') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

panels.title: Dispatcher Outbound Connection Thread Queue Size
